title: I didn't let anyone else play my account, but I was suspended for MMR Boosting?
body:
I dont understand why,I'm just playing rank games with my friend, I used to play normal games more but it doesn't mean I'm bad at ranks...
We even didn't win much, like half win and half lose. Why did Riot suspend my account??? 

I'm leaving Australia next month, that why I'm playing ranks with friends, its like my last try.  But really??Suspension for 2 weeks??
I cherish every days' game time with my friends here...only one month left and Riot gonna take 2 weeks away...
It's cruel, I did nothing wrong. Go check my records plz...

replies.body:
If you wish to appeal the suspension you can submit a ticket to player support. If it was a false positive they'll be able to remove the suspension, but if it is a legitimate ban then nothing will be done.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
